bug.author: ryanjulian
bug.summary: Pipenv install broken on pipenv v2020.5.28

comments.comment: Not clear that <denchmark-link:https://github.com/rlworkgroup/garage/pull/1423>#1423</denchmark-link> is the root cause, because 2019.10 is also broken in a similar way <denchmark-link:https://travis-ci.com/github/rlworkgroup/garage/jobs/340842638>https://travis-ci.com/github/rlworkgroup/garage/jobs/340842638</denchmark-link>
Pipenv cut a new final release finally. That broke it ðŸ˜† Will investigate the cause tomorrow
